text: #CBJ G Elvis Merzlikins will start tonight.
Elvis Merzlikins will start for #CBJ vs #Yotes tonight.  Danforth stays in Domi will wait for his return.
Elvis Merzlikins will get the nod on Thursday https://t.co/H0pwThDiWc
Elvis Merzlikins will be in the crease on Thursday night against Arizona. For Fantasy Analysis Click Here: https://t.co/55IzFMgmQn
With Elvis Merzlikins starting in Arizona tonight hes the first #CBJ goalie to start three straight games this season.
